title: Kendall Jenner flaunts her trim figure as she jets around Beverly Hills in sister Kylie's Ferrari
text:
Her nieces True Thompson and Penelope Disick went for a ride in a mini sports car earlier this week.

Kendall Jenner zoomed through Beverly Hills on Sunday in the real thing, a sleek black Ferrari.

The 23–year–old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star borrowed the car from her sister Kylie, who showed it off this week on Instagram.

Need for speed: Kendall Jenner, 23, zoomed through Beverly Hills on Sunday to grab some lunch. She drove a sleek black Ferrari owned by her sister Kylie Jenner

Kendall looked ready for a workout in a plain pair of black leggings, which highlighted her long, slender legs.

The 5ft10in model paired them with a simple white tank top that showcased her fit arms.

She stuck to the casual theme with a pair of white trainers, and she carried along a slim graphic Dior handbag with a short red strap under her arm.

Her brunette tresses rested over her back and fluttered in the wind, and she blocked out the sun with a pair of thin black sunglasses, a style that has been popular with the Kardashian–Jenner clan.

Fit figure: Kendall looked ready for a workout in a pair of figure-hugging black leggings and a white tank top

Kendall made a stop for lunch while out and about in Beverly Hills, before heading back to her speed machine.

Though the model has her own collection of new and vintage sports cars, the black Ferrari actually belongs to her sister Kylie.

The cosmetics billionaire received the car as a 'push gift' last year, a present in honor of her giving birth to baby Stormi.

Kylie didn't state who gave her the car at the time, but it was reportedly a gift from her ex-boyfriend Travis Scott.

In 2016, Kendall appeared on an episode of Jay Leno's Garage with her parent Caitlyn Jenner, also a sports car enthusiast.

The reality star took Jay for a ride in her 1956 robin egg blue Corvette.

Car buff: Kendall has her own impressive car collection. She and Caitlyn Jenner appeared on a 2016 episode of Jay Leno's Garage to show off her blue 1956 Corvette

On Saturday, Kendall shared images from her newest ad campaign for Valentino.

She was photographed in front of Los Angeles' Broadway Palace Apartments in a frilly lavender body suit with a striking red handbag with a prominent 'V' logo.

She contorted her slender frame and bent forward to show off the stunning look.

Stunning: On Saturday, Kendall shared images from her newest ad campaign for Valentino

Striking style: She was photographed in front of Los Angeles' Broadway Palace Apartments in a frilly lavender body suit with a striking red handbag with a prominent 'V' logo

Kendall also appeared earlier this month in an ad campaign for Calvin Klein that also featured her ex-boyfriend A$AP Rocky.

The model and the rapper were linked in 2017 and most recently caught up during one of her brother–in–law Kanye West's Sunday Service performances in August.

The performance was one of Rocky's first public outings after being released from a Swedish jail this summer, where he was being held for an alleged assault.

Keeping busy: Kendall also appeared earlier this month in an ad campaign for Calvin Klein that also featured her ex-boyfriend A$AP Rocky
description: Kendall Jenner jetted around Beverly Hills Sunday in a black Ferrari while wearing athletic leggings and a tank top. The sports car belongs to her sister Kylie, who got it after giving birth to Stormi.
